channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m 67, childless, and have $4.3 million. Do I have enough to start giving money away to my nieces and nephews?
item.description: Your definition of “enough” is what matters most, because you can’t take back gifts.

item.title: Dollar's Falls After Trump's Tariff Remarks Could Prove Limited
item.description: The dollar was lower but its decline could prove to be limited after President Trump said he’d prefer not to impose new tariffs on China.

item.title: Verizon’s stock rises after biggest gain in five years on key subscriber metric
item.description: The company added 568,000 postpaid phone subscribers in the fourth quarter.

item.title: Investors Bet Trump Will Make Europe Investable Again
item.description: The big hope is that Europe will move faster to implement reforms in the face of competitive threats from the U.S.

item.title: Stock Futures Mixed With Amex, Verizon Earnings in Spotlight
item.description: U.S. stock futures wobbled while markets in China and Europe made gains.

item.title: Foreigners are chasing U.S. stocks. Historically, that’s a bad sign.
item.description: Foreigners have a tendency to buy U.S. stocks right before crashes.

item.title: Amex sees spending growth accelerate as it projects upbeat sales this year
item.description: Amex is also boosting its dividend by 17%.

item.title: Base Metal Prices Rise; Copper Hits 10-Week Highs on Weaker Dollar
item.description: Base metal prices rose, with copper sitting at 10-week highs as the U.S. dollar weakened overnight on Trump’s comments.

item.title: MicroStrategy Suddenly Has a Tax Problem, and Needs Help From Trump's IRS
item.description: New rules could tax unrealized gains on bitcoin holdings at large companies.

item.title: Will Trump’s tough stance on remote work drag everyone else back to the office? Don’t bet on it.
item.description: In his first day back on the job, President Donald Trump officially joined a fight that some bosses are picking to end remote work and get their staff...
